title: Water Traces on Mars
description: Confirmed hydrated minerals on Martian surface, indicating past flowing liquid water.

title: First Exoplanet Discoveries
description: Confirmation of planets orbiting stars beyond our Sun, revolutionizing astronomy.

title: Gravitational Waves Detected
description: First direct detection of ripples in spacetime from merging black holes, confirming Einstein's prediction.

title: Cosmic Microwave Background Anisotropies
description: Detailed mapping of the faint afterglow of the Big Bang revealed tiny temperature fluctuations, seeds of cosmic structure.

title: Accelerating Universe Expansion
description: Discovery that the expansion of the universe is speeding up, attributed to mysterious dark energy.

title: Imaging a Black Hole's Shadow
description: First direct image of the shadow of a supermassive black hole (M87*), providing visual evidence.
